## `UseJavaScriptCookies`

Toggles whether the web harvester parses JavaScript for cookies needed by the website.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
UseJavaScriptCookies(bool useJSCookies)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`bool` useJSCookies | `true` to use cookies parsed from JavaScript when connecting to webpages. |
